name: places/ChIJ17vs7IRYwokRQmpeGPV8Rls
formattedAddress: 115 W 86th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 115 W 86th St, New York, NY 10024-3410, USA

originalText.text:
Dr Osterman have been coming to my rescue many times over the course of some 30 years. And his adjustments never failed to bring relief to my sciatica,  neck pain, pulled ligaments etc I have been using other chiropractors but always returned to Dr Osterman who is better attuned to his patients and more precise in his treatment methods then  anyone else I know.
Also, I could attest to his integrity and high level of professionalism. I referred many people to him, and he never turned down anyone including those who were uninsured and could not afford to pay full fee.

originalText.text: Dr Jeffery Osterman is awful! I had one visit with him in 2016 and I could not believe his over-the-top behavior, totally nuts! At the receptionist's desk I paid the Unitedhealth Care copay of $40. The doctor worked me over and when I was leaving the receptionist told me the massage cost an additional $100 which I paid. At home, my wife called United and she was told the doctor should not have charged me extra. My wife called the doctor's office, explained the situation to the receptionist and she put the doctor on. He became psychotic, yelled at my wife (I could hear him from the sofa!). It didn't help as he didn't want to refund the $100. I filed a complaint with a state medical board but I don't think any action was taken. Look for another chiropractor and ignore the nice reviews. All you need is one instance and we had ours.

originalText.text:
A VERY BAD EXPERIENCE! STAY AWAY!

Treatment: pleasant. After effects: VERY unpleasant.  My first visit was okay until after the doctor finished and I had to deal with the lady at the front desk who told me that a problem arose with my HMO which resulted in my overpaying the copay and I was also charged $100 for the "examination" (a few minutes of questions!). I thought that the problem would be corrected so I paid and made an appointment for the next day, being told it would cost me just the co-pay.

When I got home and explained to my wife what had happened she called to see what the problem was. Mr Osterman answered the phone because his office assistant was out. Without any prodding he unhinged and became irrational yelling at my wife at the top of his lungs, I could hear him a short distance away!

He refused to see that an error with the initial copay had been made by his office assistant which would result in a partial refund but he would not settle the matter amiably. He also charged me for the next day's appointment which I had canceled.

One visit: $200 and a screaming on top of it!

originalText.text:
GUY is a total quack! I went there after hurting my back from a sudden movement. It was my first time visiting a Chiropractor. He seemed pleasant and had his son working as receptionist. His son took my insurance card afterwards charged me $160 for like ten minutes. I was told that the insurance would reimburse me which I found odd and that the 160 was for the initial consultations. When I inquired about how the insurance company would reimburse me the son told me they didn't accept my insurance...AND HAD THE NERVE TO TRY TO SET ME UP FOR A FOLLOW UP....In hind sight I COULD HAVE GONE to a massage parlor and gotten worked on for an hour for less...
And it's not the money but the dishonesty...…….CROOKS!

originalText.text: FOUL, OBSCENE & UNPROFESSIONAL: DO NOT give this doctor your business. He is the most unprofessional and obscene person I've ever dealt with. After having a discussion about billing issues with my insurance he told me to get out of his office and to go f*#k myself. This occurred on the evening of 12/29 after having an altercation with him and his incompetent receptionist regarding billing my insurance. Both him and the receptionist told me that it was too much work and inconvenient to bill my insurance so that i would have to pay the full fee. Mind you, i was only alerted about this after i showed up. When i objected they offered no other explanation but to berate me in a rude manner implying that it was all my fault and to get out of his office. That is when he verbally assaulted me. Other reviewers on yelp will also speak to the rudeness and unprofessionalism of this individual. He's a foul and obscene human being, i cannot believe he's suppose to provide medical care to patients. STAY AWAY.
